articles.description: Ben Duckett would be infuriating to bowl at and is establishing himself as one of the best all-format batters in the world, writes Jonathan Agnew.

articles.description: India will not change from their plan to play star bowler Jasprit Bumrah in only three of the five Tests against England this summer, says coach Gautam Gambhir.
articles.title: England vs India: Jasprit Bumrah will still only play three Tests despite defeat - Gautam Gambhir
